All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BackgroundPanel
Class used to create the logo of the game as an image.
ButtonBuilder
Class in charge of the creation of the JButton that will be on the interactive interfaces.
Component
General interface that will determine that an object can be converted into a swing component.
CountDownPanel
Panel in charge of the display of the timer of the game
Game
Main game class in charge of the start of the game
GameController
Class used as an interface between the controller and the view.
GameController.View
View interface used to act as controller with th view
GameImageListener
Class used to create new image game listeners
GameImagePanel
Class in charge of the creation of game image panel view
GameListeners
Class to manage all the game listeners
GameScreen
Class used to handle the game screens
GameSettings
 
GameStats
Class used as a container to store all the stats of the game such as points, time, win, username.
HeaderPanel
Class used to create and display the header content that will have a dropdown with some game options.
IdleController
Idle controller in charge of managing of the idle status.
IdleController.View
Controller view interface used to use the (view - model) pattern
IdlePanel
Class in charge of the game idle panel status rendering.
ImageBuilder
Class in charge of the creation of the JLabel that will display images on the interactive interfaces.
ImagePicker
Utility class used to pick a random image from the GameSettings.IMAGES_DIR folder.
ImageUtils
Utility class used to handle some image operations.
LabelBuilder
Class in charge of the creation of the JLabel that will be on the interactive interfaces.
MenuHeaderObject
Class in charge of the creation of the JMenu that will be on the interactive interfaces.
MenuItemObject
Class in charge of the creation of the JMenuItem that will be on the interactive interfaces.
MenuObject
Class in charge of the creation of the JMenuBar that will be on the interactive interfaces.
Panel
Class in charge of the creation of the JPanel that will be on the interactive interfaces.
Screen
Class in charge of the creation of the JFrame that will be on the interactive interfaces.
SidebarPanel
Class used to display the right buttons that act as a sidebar on the main game.
SolutionPanel
Class used to create new solution panel view components.
SolutionPanel.Footer
Class used to render the footer panel view.
SolutionPanel.Solution
Class used to render the solution panel view.
SplitImage
Class in charge of the storage of the parts of a complete rendered image Furthermore, each part will be identified by an index to make sure order integrity.
SplitPanelBuilder
Class in charge of the creation of the JSplitPane that will be on the interactive interfaces.
StartGamePanel
Class used to render the creating game settings view
StartGameScreen
Class in charge of the initialization of new game ask input instances.
StatsPanel
Class used to create new Stats panels to display all the user stats, this can be also used to filter by name.
StatsReader
Class in charge of the files with sentinel reading
StatsUtils
 
StatsWriter
Class in charge of the files with sentinel writing
TextAreaBuilder
Class in charge of the creation of the JTextArea that will be on the interactive interfaces.
TextFieldBuilder
Class in charge of the creation of the JTextField that will be on the interactive interfaces.
Ticker
Class in charge of performing an action in a fixed time rate represented by the GameSettings.TIMER_DELTA and it will consume the given action.
ToolBarBuilder
Class in charge of the creation of the JToolBar that will be on the interactive interfaces.
